ygData.subject: Re: Libary Book Quest starting in Erudin
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI, it s actually Highpass Hold, but that s not important right now : ) This place is pretty dangerous and a long and slightly dangerous trip through the
ygData.messageBody:
FYI, it's actually Highpass Hold, but that's not important right now : )
This place is pretty dangerous and a long and slightly dangerous trip
through the Karanas just to get there if you are coming from Odus. Being
able to Invis would make this much safer but you can't do that yet. ( But
if you decide to do it, you might be ok if you learn the safest way through
the Karanas zones (along edges of zones, etc.) and hope that the HpH is very
busy which means that the main spawning points are camped and you can walk
on by unscathed. That's a lot to hope for )) I'd wait til later or find a
guide/protector to get you there.

Have fun!
Draco - Wizard 20 - Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
Subject: [eq_wizards] Libary Book Quest starting in Erudin
From: duffjc@...

My question is: What lvl should I be before attempting to go to HighHold
Pass. I have heard this is a dangerous place to travel at lower levels. I
am currently lvl 7.

Thanks for your answers ahead of time,
Dason
Intrests in things Arcane.
